html:
11.30.18  11:53 pm   Who is the king of the world?

     you

11.30.18  11:51 pm   motivation tips?

     everything around you was once believed to be impossible

11.30.18  11:37 pm   hi bill, you beautiful human person. how do you write the musics so good? 

     i have to wait until it writes me

11.30.18  11:24 pm   How can I make a choice when I can't know all the consequences? 

     you must guess

11.30.18  11:15 pm   How often do you dab on the haters?

     they were already dabbed upon long ago

11.30.18  11:13 pm   When I'm bored with lectures at school, which is all the time. What is the best thing to do to entertain yourself

     write songs?

11.30.18  11:11 pm   I AM TOO SCARED TO EXPRESS MYSELF. PLEASE HELP.

     looks like you are already doing it

11.30.18  10:17 pm   I've always wondered, what's your favorite breakfast to have? 

     lunch

11.30.18  10:08 pm   what do you do other than make videos and sleep? 

     tweets, anagrams, songs (for the videos), and questions

11.30.18  10:06 pm   My girlfriend is a graphic designer and she hates your website?

     that makes sense, this site doesn't use graphics, which is probably what she enjoys most

11.30.18  10:05 pm   can you pick up a laundry basket full of laundry with one hand?

     yes

11.30.18  9:54 pm   I am a jazz major in college and I really appreciate your music for being pretty harmonically complex but also really easy to listen to. How do you approach coming up with the progressions in your songs?

     approach the entire song together as a package. actually it's even better to let the song approach you

11.30.18  9:51 pm   Do you sleep?

     yes

      Are these ueqstions showing the times you answered or more-so the time they were asked?

     asked

      I'm worried about your REM. and REM.

Also, I have got to skip talking much about myself with acquaintances or asking questions by showing them your videos. If they like it, we are friends. If they don't like it, we are frenemies. Thx 4 that. Ok bye luv u.

11.30.18  9:48 pm   would you be interested in trying using multiple spoken languages in a song?

     that would be ideal

     Like do some verses in english, then some in korean, then some in italian, etc?

     hopefully mixed a bit more thoroughly than that

11.30.18  9:32 pm   do you hate food because it's a weird reminder of one's animality and limitation? (that's my thoughts about food)

     no

11.30.18  9:29 pm   what's your personality type?

     medium

11.30.18  9:24 pm   bill have you ever hated love. i hate love. how do i not hate love.

     if you hate it then why do you want to like it

11.30.18  9:08 pm   How many fingers am I holding up?

     27

11.30.18  8:21 pm   will you birth my child

     i will try

11.30.18  7:31 pm   What's your favorite quote you made in "history of the entire world, i guess"

     the king of england and the king of france both want to be the king of france, so they fight about it for 100 years. fuck it, maybe more. they almost didn't even notice the black death

11.30.18  6:38 pm   Any tips for practicing improvisation ?

     start making things up!

11.30.18  6:28 pm   when will you make another notebook entry

     every day on twitter, depending on which ones i decide to add to the notebook section, which in the past has been maybe 40% or so

11.30.18  6:24 pm    How do you make the tune 

     it is best to let it make you

11.30.18  5:54 pm   with what frequency and intensity do you hit that yeet

     i have auto-yeet, running in the background steadily at about 100hz

11.30.18  5:25 pm   In a lot of your answers, you seem to be implying that you don't do this work because you enjoy it but rather because you seem to believe that you have no other options.

     i disagree

      But on the other hand, it seems like your content couldn't possibly be this high quality unless you truly enjoyed making it. Do you have a comment on this observation?

     i think the first part is wrong and the second part is right

11.30.18  5:23 pm   when is your favorite time to exist?

     now

11.30.18  5:19 pm   I didn't see the christmas isn't real lyrics until an hour after it went up. can you try to fix this?

     the lyrics are there now. it is fixed

11.30.18  5:18 pm   does random=funny 

     let me perform some calculations

11.30.18  5:16 pm   What is a fork?

     a stick with teeth

11.30.18  5:11 pm   hello friend what is your opinion on trombone

     a good weapon, for both offense and defense

11.30.18  5:07 pm   Can't stop listening to your music. Should i proceed anyway 

     sure

11.30.18  4:14 pm   What does it mean when the timestamp is a link?

     that would be a link to a question that was asked at that time

11.30.18  3:24 pm   will you ever sing a song in french

     yes

11.30.18  3:18 pm   Hey Bill, where do you get inspiration for your songs

     in the earth's atmostphere, and on its surface

     (I love all of them btw)? Also reading these questions have started to make me ask myself "Christ, is this man ok?"... Are you ok?

     i was actually curious about whether you were ok

11.30.18  3:16 pm   My entire family is misinterpreting my art for something creepy and disturbing and now I don't want to do it anymore. Am I just fucked?

     oh wait til you see what it feels like for the entire general public to think that

11.30.18  3:04 pm   What is your inspiration?

     everything

11.30.18  2:59 pm   Whats your opinon on the new smash bros

     not enough characters

11.30.18  2:50 pm   what do you think about triplets that have an eighth note followed by a quarter note?

     trippy

11.30.18  2:26 pm   How can i make Christmas� real again, for maximum immersion?

     search the cold quiet streets for a food store that's open

11.30.18  1:55 pm   What in the frick goes in ur mind every day

     a constant stream of rainbows, which i am beginning to suspect is all the same rainbow

11.30.18  1:30 pm   will you make a video about bees

     yes, and birds

11.30.18  1:01 pm   what do you think about pop music?

     it's good, or at least it's supposed to be

11.30.18  12:22 pm   why is bread

     it is the lord's will

11.30.18  11:22 am   is wonderful christmastime a good or bad song

     it could be both, depending on your vantage point

11.30.18  10:40 am   Do you like to consume?

     yes, and produce

11.30.18  10:36 am   Did the music really cure your disease?

     it is capable of doing that sort of thing

11.30.18  10:27 am   should I learn how to play the bassoon? just kidding I already do

     oh you almost had me there for a second

11.30.18  8:30 am   If the earth is flat then what would the ozone layer look like?

     a flat layer of ozone

11.30.18  6:42 am   Hi Bill, your song said the English is not real, the only language is feelings, so........can you feel what im talking about now?

     most of the feeling is ascertained from the way you used the dots there

11.30.18  5:30 am   i'm addicted to social media and it's getting in the way of my productivity and making me feel pretty shitty. as soon as i wake up in the morning i roll over and check my phone, and i am constantly checking it throughout the day... i'm at the point where i don't think i really know who i am and what i like doing anymore because i'm always on social media. i just can't seem to break the habit even though i know that it's harming me. do you have any tips on how to break the habit? how do i build the strength to just not pick up my phone??

     it mostly hinges upon whether you can avoid it first thing in the morning. it also helps to know what you are doing with your day instead. then bury the phone in a drawer
